author: omalley
msg: Added fix for failed/killed-uberjob cleanup; removed redundant JIP accessors
for speculation; explicitly forced speculation off for uber mode; fixed four
unit tests; renamed JIP getUberMode() accessor to more expected isUber();
fixed order of expected/actual values in TestBadRecords asserts.  (Still
lots of debug junk--will remove in next commit.)

author: omalley
msg: Replace deprecated mapred.local.dir with mapreduce.cluster.local.dir in taskcontroller

author: omalley
msg: Add job configuration parameters and their values to the trace generated by Rumen.
+   [MR-2153]: Add job configuration parameters and their values from
+  the job configuration files to the trace generated by Rumen. Patch available
